name: don
text: I highly recommend this movie to everyone.

name: Onkar Sangha
text: I've already recommended it to all my friends.

name: Diya Jani
text: I couldn't have asked for a better moviegoing experience. I was on the edge of my seat the entire time.

name: Ishaan Dar
text: I was completely immersed in the story. I was blown away by the performances.

name: Heer Gaba
text: I can't believe I waited so long to see this movie. I was moved to tears by the end.
